title: Boston African American National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Become a Junior Ranger! When you come to Boston African American National Historic Site, find a National Park Ranger at the Museum of African American Historyâ€™s Abiel Smith School, located at 46 Joy Street. A Park Ranger can give you a copy of the Junior Ranger Handbook.  When you complete the activities in the handbook, a Park Ranger will present a Junior Ranger badge to you.  If you can't wait to get your hands on one, download and print it yourself! Or you can call us and ask us to send one to you. Our number is (617) 742-5415. You can even send us an email.   Please note, when sending in your Junior Ranger Book to receive your badge, please use our new address... Boston African American NHS 15 State Street, 9th Floor Boston, MA, 02109
